short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Provides classroom management, learning support and student safeguarding.
short.ja: 教室の管理、学習サポート、生徒の保護を提供します。
short.nl: Biedt klassenmanagement, leerondersteuning en bescherming van studenten.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows ChromeOS devices to connect to Impero’s cloud-based classroom management solution supporting all major operating systems. Enable teachers to deliver digital learning anywhere, on any device. 
Supported features:

Real-time monitoring - see device activity in real time
Send message - send a direct one way message to the device
Launch website - open a web site on the device automatically
Lock screen - lock the screen of the app
Disable internet - disable internet access inside the app
Restrict browsing - enforce allow and block website lists
Tab management - view open browser tabs lists and close open tabs
Broadcast Screen - Broadcast teacher and student screens to the class

Key monitoring - Monitors typed words and sends captures to Backdrop if keywords are found
Viewed words - Monitors viewed words in the Impero browser and sends captures to Backdrop if keywords are found

This application is for Impero Classroom & Wellbeing, not Impero Education Pro or Impero Edlink.
